name: Daycare
Dialogue: I run a DAYCARE. Would you like me to raise one of your POKEMON?

name: Daycare_after
Dialogue: Fine, I'll look after <POKEMON> for a while. Come see me in a while.

name: Daycare_pickingup
Dialogue: Back already? Your <POKEMON> needs some more time with me.
Your <POKEMON> has grown a lot! By level, it's grown by <#>! Aren't I great?
You owe me P<###> for the return of this POKEMON.

name: Guard
Dialogue: I'm on guard duty. Gee, I'm thirsty, though! Oh wait there, the road's closed.

name: Building3
Dialogue: Hi! Do you have NIDORAN(Male)? Want to trade it for NIDORAN(Female)?
...This is no NIDORAN(Male). If you get one, trade it with me!
Okay, connect the cable like so!

name: Building4
Dialogue: People often lose things in that UNDERGROUND PATH.
